content.rendered:
Photo by Kaboompics

It’s been a quieter week in the Genesis community this week with a lot of people taking time out for Thanksgiving.

If you’re in the mood for a discount though I’ve got a few of my favourite Genesis related Black Friday / Cyber Monday deals.

Plus, there’s still a few themes, showcase sites and tutorials to keep you occupied.

Discounts behold!

Apparently there’s something called Black Friday / Cyber Monday / Please Let It Be Tuesday (Already) going on at the moment…

If you’re in the hunt for a deal though now is the time to buy buy buy with many Genesis related products offering their deepest discounts of the year.

I’m not sure when each of these deals expires exactly, but here’s a few of my favourites that are still good at the time of writing (all links are affiliate free).

  • GenesisTheme – 25% off starter theme – CYBER2016
  • Know The Code – $71 off – BLACKFRIDAY2016
  • Minimal Genesis – 20% off – holiday
  • Musket Theme – 30% off – BLACKFRIDAY16
  • SimpleProThemes – 20% off – blackfriday
  • WPStudio – 30% off – BF2016

Want even more? Check out this handy Facebook thread started by Susan Ramsey

Themes

Tonya Mork generously shares her Hello Minimal Genesis child theme on GitHub.

@bgardner I pushed my Hello Minimal child theme to GitHub. Feel free to use any part of it https://t.co/N13WANdYsY #genesiswp

— Tonya Mork (@hellofromTonya) November 21, 2016

Showcase

Mike Hemberger for the thepaleomom.com

ICYMI, we officially launched https://t.co/JaGcvFRjfK rebrand. My first build since converting my starter theme to full #flexbox #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/SDok4JznUA

— Mike Hemberger (@JiveDig) November 23, 2016

Neil Gee with a new site built on Infinity Pro for dev.dr.websitelove.com.au

New site using Infinity Pro #GenesisWP theme, great for showcasing art – https://t.co/pmB6XNEdh9 pic.twitter.com/F6cDCwo1SA

— Neil Gee (@_neilgee) November 22, 2016

Congrats to Callia Web on picking up an award for cambridgefoodcollective.com

So delighted for our client @CamFoodHub for winning gold in Lifestyle website at @CambsDigiAwards – a #genesiswp website 🙂 pic.twitter.com/OrxWyKiC8s

— Callia Web (@CalliaWeb) November 24, 2016

Best of the rest

Jon Barratt releases the Genesis Clip for his WP Clips project.

I am so excited to release this for fellow #GenesisWP users. WP Clips for Genesis. Check out the details at https://t.co/wdyLrHONKu

— WP Clips (@WP_Clips) November 23, 2016

Sridhar Katakam on changing footer text in Genesis using the genesis_footer_creds_text filter.

Changing footer text in Genesis using genesis_footer_creds_text filter:https://t.co/vsmn4xsC70#GenesisWP

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) November 24, 2016

That’s all for this week.

If you were having a break for Thanksgiving, I hope you had a great one.

And my thanks to you all for your continued support.

PS Don’t want to miss future round-ups? Subscribe below and rest easy…

excerpt.rendered: Discounts, discounts and more Genesis discounts. Plus, the latest themes, tutorials and showcase sites.
